short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to see your page's most important seo elements and metrics!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This powerful tool instantly showcases critical website metrics. From elements like 'title' and 'description' for SEO optimization to 'canonical' and 'h1' tags, 'alternate hreflang' versions, and 'OG Tags' for social media sharing, our tool makes it easy to monitor essential components of your website. It also provides insights into 'Core Web Vitals' and 'LDJsons' for performance and structural data, helping you make your website faster and more user-friendly. Designed as an indispensable tool for web developers and digital marketers."

This extension is designed to empower website owners and developers with the information they need to improve site performance and optimize their SEO strategies, ultimately helping them establish a successful online presence.
